Welcome to soilcarbon, an R package containing tools to analyze the soil carbon database created by the USGS Powell Center working group.

# Intallation
```{r, results='hide'}
devtools::install_github("powellcenter-soilcarbon/soilcarbon")
```

```{r}
library(soilcarbon)
testdata_directory<-system.file("extdata", "UNALTERED_TEMPLATE_v120616.xlsx", package = "soilcarbon")
testdata<-importdata(file=testdata_directory)
names(testdata)
```
